question:
Writers, particularly those of the contemplative persuasion, have always found the ________ nature of the mind—with its passing thoughts and inconstant moods—difficult to convey in language.
Two Answers
A. inchoate
B. essential
C. vestigial
D. ephemeral
E. evasive
F. flleeting
Show
Hide
